0.2.name: wordpress/post2media
0.2.description:
This adds a new button on the media page, which allows to link a media to a post, without inserting it into the content. If the link to the post already exists, it will remain the old link.

Localizations

  • Thanks to Frank Bültge for german language file
  • Thanks to Markus Zeeh for norge language file
  • Thanks to Brian Flores for spanish translation
  • Lithuanian translation files by Vincent G
